   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Documentation of Flint
=================================

.. note::
  This project is under active developement. There is no first version yet.

This document describes the C and C++ bindings for the Flint library.
If you are unfamiliar with this project you might want to check out the :doc:`getting_started` section.

.. toctree::
  :maxdepth: 1

  getting_started
  c_api/index
  cpp_api/index
